src:
Dončić prekaša celo Magica Johnsona
Dallasovemu Slovencu v ligi NBA uspel enajsti trojni dvojček. Tekmeci ga hvalijo, da je pravi košarkarski čarovnik z žogo.
05 Nov 2019, 06:20 by M. U.
NEW YORK – Po dveh tednih rednega dela lige NBA sta ekipi slovenskih zvezdnikov pod samim vrhom. Miami Gorana Dragića je z izkupičkom petih zmag in enega poraza drugo najboljše moštvo lige takoj za še neporaženo Philadelphio 76ers, Luka Dončić z Dallasom pa vsak večer poskrbi za nove presežke in rekorde. Mavericks so se po nesrečnem porazu proti Los Angeles Lakers hitro vrnili v zmagovalne tirnice. Zasedba trenerja Ricka Carlisla je v Clevelandu z izidom 131:111 četrtič zmagala in se utrdila na četrtem mestu na zahodu. Glavni akter je bil znova Dončić. Dosegel je svoj drugi trojni dvojček v nizu – 29 točk, 14 skokov, 15 podaj. Neverjetne številke je zaokrožil z odličnim metom iz igre – 9:17 oziroma 5:10 za tri točke. To je bil njegov enajsti trojni dvojček v karieri in tretji v sezoni. Hkrati je postal prvi igralec po Oscarju Robertsonu leta 1965, ki je zaporedoma zbral več kot 25 točk, 10 skokov in 10 podaj. Enajst trojnih dvojčkov je tudi največ v ligi NBA pri košarkarjih, ki še niso praznovali 21. rojstnega dne. Magic Johnson, ki je držal prejšnji mejnik, je v Dončićevi starosti dosegel sedem trojnih dvojčkov. »Res uživam v igranju košarke, in tokrat sem se spet zelo zabaval. Na vsaki tekmi želim igrati dobro,« je po tekmi proti Cavaliers povedal Dončić. Pri Clevelandu je imel Kevin Love prav tako 29 točk, po dvoboju pa se je zaradi nove sanjske predstave priklonil Dončiću. »Je čarovnik z žogo in res ga je težko ustaviti,« ga je pohvalil. S povprečjem 26,7 točke na tekmo je 20-letni Ljubljančan ta čas deveti najučinkovitejši igralec lige, po statističnem indeksu (32) je četrti, po številu podaj pa celo tretji (9,5). Njegovo povprečje po šestih tekmah je torej 26,7 točke, 10,3 skoka in 9,5 podaje v povprečno 35,5 minute igre. Za Dallas je proti Clevelandu Latvijec Kristaps Porzingis zbral 18 točk in šest blokad.
Dallasa zanima Paul
V zakulisju lige NBA pa se šušlja, da se bo zgodila trgovina med Dallasom in moštvom Oklahoma City Thunder. Grmenje za uvod sezone rezultatsko ne blesti, Maverickse pa zanima njihov zvezdnik Chris Paul, 34-letni devetkratni udeleženec tekme All-Star. Paul bi torej lahko igral za ekipo, ki se poteguje za končnico, poleg tega bi skupaj z Dončićem in Porzingisom tvoril veliki trojec. Edina težava za Dallas bi lahko bila Paulova masivna pogodba, v naslednjih treh sezonah naj bi zaslužil več kot 100 milijonov dolarjev. Uspeha v ligi NBA se je veselil tudi Goran Dragić, ki je za zmago Miami Heat nad Houston Rockets (129:100) prispeval 15 točk, štiri podaje in dva skoka. Nekdanji slovenski reprezentančni kapetan ima po prvih šestih tekmah povprečje 16,2 točke, 4,2 podaje in 3,3 skoke. Miami ima pred seboj niz treh gostovanj, najprej bo odšel v Denver, kjer tretji Slovenec v ligi NBA Vlatko Čančar še vedno čaka na prve točke. LeBron James je tako kot Dončić na drugi zaporedni tekmi dosegel trojni dvojček. Njegova ekipa Los Angeles Lakers je s 103:96 premagala San Antonio Spurs za še peto zmago po vrsti. James je vpisal 21 točk, 11 skokov in 13 podaj za jezernike.
text:
Doncic surpasses even Magic Johnson
The Dallas Slovenian in the NBA has managed the eleventh triple-double. Runners praise him for being a true basketball wizard with the ball.
05 Nov 2019, 06:20 by M. U.
NEW YORK - After two weeks of regular NBA work, teams of Slovenian celebrities are at the top. With five wins and one loss, Goran Dragic's Miami is the league's second-best team immediately behind the undefeated Philadelphia 76ers, and Luka Doncic with Dallas every night sets new records and records. The Mavericks quickly returned to winning rails after an unfortunate defeat against the Los Angeles Lakers. Coach Rick Carlisle's squad won for the fourth time in Cleveland with a fourth-place finish of 131-111 and consolidated into fourth place in the West. Dončić was again the main actor. He scored his second triple-double in a series - 29 points, 14 rebounds, 15 passes. He rounded up the incredible numbers with an excellent throw from the game - 9:17 and 5:10 respectively for three points. It was his eleventh triple-double in his career and third in a season. He also became the first player after Oscar Robertson in 1965 to score more than 25 points, 10 rebounds and 10 assists. Eleven triple-doubles are also the most in the NBA in basketball that has not yet celebrated its 21st birthday. Holding the previous milestone, Magic Johnson scored seven triple twins at Doncic's age. “I really enjoy playing basketball, and this time I had a lot of fun. I want to play well in every game, "Doncic said after the game against the Cavaliers. At Cleveland, Kevin Love also had 29 points, and after a duel, he bowed to Doncic because of a new dream performance. "He's a ball wizard and it's really hard to stop him," he praised him. With an average of 26.7 points per game, the 20-year-old Ljubljana player is the ninth most efficient player in the league this time, according to the statistical index (32) he is the fourth and even third (9.5). His six-game average is 26.7 points, 10.3 rebounds and 9.5 assists in an average of 35.5 minutes a game. For Dallas, Latvian Kristaps Porzingis tallied 18 points and six blocks against Cleveland.
Dallas is interested in Paul
In the back of the NBA, however, it is rumored that a trade between Dallas and the Oklahoma City Thunder will happen. The thunder for the season's introduction doesn't shine through, and the Mavericks are interested in their star Chris Paul, a 34-year-old nine-time All-Star participant. Paul could therefore play for the team to make the playoffs, and he would form a big three with Doncic and Porzingis. The only problem for Dallas could be Paul's massive contract, he is expected to earn more than $ 100 million over the next three seasons. Goran Dragic also enjoyed success in the NBA, contributing 15 points, four rebounds and two rebounds to the Miami Heat's 129-100 victory. The former Slovenian national team captain has averaged 16.2 points, 4.2 passes and 3.3 rebounds after his first six games. Miami has a series of three away games, first going to Denver, where the third Slovenian in the NBA Vlatko Cancar is still waiting for the first points. Like Doncic, LeBron James scored a triple-double in the second consecutive game. His Los Angeles Lakers team beat the San Antonio Spurs by 103-96 for their fifth straight win. James recorded 21 points, 11 rebounds and 13 passes for the Lakeers.
